publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4554 Ms Sandra White: Congratulations to St Andrew’s Secondary School, Carntyne—That the Parliament congratulates the head teacher, staff and pupils of St Andrew’s Secondary School in Carntyne, Glasgow, on their tremendous achievement in being awarded five "excellents" by inspectors from Her Majesty’s Inspectorate of Education; recognises that St Andrew’s epitomises the ideals of self-discipline and community responsibility combined with diligence and a willingness to learn, and affirms that this has been achieved as a result of the leadership and spiritual guidance which the head teacher, Mr Malone, and his staff have provided and, in doing so, have created a safe, happy and successful working environment.

S2M-4554 Ms Sandra White: Congratulations to St Andrew’s Secondary School, Carntyne—That the Parliament congratulates the head teacher, staff and pupils of St Andrew’s Secondary School in Carntyne, Glasgow, on their tremendous achievement in being awarded five "excellents" by inspectors from Her Majesty’s Inspectorate of Education; recognises that St Andrew’s epitomises the ideals of self-discipline and community responsibility combined with diligence and a willingness to learn, and affirms that this has been achieved as a result of the leadership and spiritual guidance which the head teacher, Mr Malone, and his staff have provided and, in doing so, have created a safe, happy and successful working environment.
S2M-4554 Congratulations to St Andrew’s Secondary School, Carntyne (lodged on 14 June 2006) Donald Gorrie*
